caption: Figure 2: Key concepts in the self-consistency tree (operation, node, and edge). It provides a concrete example of the self-consistency tree in the AI-assisted programming task. The node v contains a function that returns the product of two positive integers, and I is its set of inputs. The prompt p asks the evaluatee LLM to rewrite the code in node v to use a looped sum instead of just multiplying, while pâ€² asks the same LLM to alter it back to simply multiplying.
reason: Diagram shows abstract system components, relationships, and process flow.
